name: 葉賜旭
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。使同學們瞭解自動控制系統的數學基礎與物理系統的數學模式化方式、相關控制器的種類與分析方式，包括：時域分析、穩定性分析、根軌跡法、頻率領域的分析、控制系統的設計等。
schedule:
1	Introduction
2	Mathematical Foundation
3	Modeling of Physical Systems
4	Block Diagrams and Signal-Flow Graphs
5	Time-Domain Analysis of Control Systems
6	Stability of Linear Control Systems
7	Root-Locus Technique
8	Frequency-Domain Analysis: Introduction
9	Frequency-Domain Analysis: General Nyquist Criterion
10	Frequency-Domain Analysis: Bode Plot
11	Frequency-Domain Analysis: Magnitude-Phase Plot/Nichols Chart
12	LabView+myRIO
scorePolicy:
單元考：60%(每單元6%, 2至11單元)
期末考：30%(全學期課程內容)
實機測驗：10%
materials: Automatic Control Systems, B. C. Kuo and F. Golnaraghi, WILEY, 8th ed.
